rationale: No intensifier or comparative directly modifies a risk-adjective.
The segment describes an article update factually without using high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment describes an article update, not realised impact using a moderate verb and scale.
The segment reports an article update but contains no explicit calming language.
No minimiser ('only', 'just', 'merely', 'a single', 'few') combined with an explicit scale contrast.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
The segment describes an article update, not capabilities or preparedness.
Reports the numerical metric of flock size ('a flock of 240,000 birds') using standard description.
